channel.title: CVE Feed for metagauss -- EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for metagauss -- EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets

item.title: CVE-2024-9864|2024-10-24T13:41:45.879Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via ticket names in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This is only exploitable when front-end users can submit new events with tickets.

item.title: CVE-2024-9865|2024-10-24T13:43:52.297Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘ep_booking_attendee_fields’ fields in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the transaction log for a booking.

item.title: CVE-2024-8369|2024-09-10T13:19:26.394Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access to Private or Password-protected events due to missing authorization checks in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view private or password-protected events.

item.title: CVE-2024-8369|2024-09-10T11:30:31.628Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access to Private or Password-protected events due to missing authorization checks in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4.3. item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘ep_booking_attendee_fields’ fields in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping.
